Hey copilot, here is what you need to know :

# Purpose of the project

This project is an « unblocked » website that is meant to deliver services like games, proxy, live chat and more while and to bypass school abusive censoring.

# Tech stack

This website is a web app that uses only HTML, JavaScript and CSS.

# Structure

This website uses a single HTML page as UI : index.html

It is organized in tabs tabs with a navbar to switch and that uses js to display different tabs.

Games and tools assets are stored in the « /assets » directory.

There is also a coreus-onefile.html file. It is meant to provide users all the website in a single file, while serving assets from external servers.

MAKE SURE TO ANALYZE THE README, INDEX.HTML AND COREUS-ONEFILE.HTML AFTER READING THIS TO BETTER UNDERSTAND

ALSO, PLS ALWAYS REMEMBER THE USER THE AI CONTRIBUTION TERMS.
